display_long_description:
Practicing mindfulness has never been more fun.

In the world of Headspace XR, you can unwind, recharge, and let go of stress and everyday anxiety. Headspace teachers guide you through over 300 meditations and 13 mindful activities and games — all in breathtaking, immersive environments. 

Just like a gym strengthens your body, the activities here are designed to support a healthier, happier mind. With content personalized to fit your mood, you can train your mind and feel the real-life benefits of a consistent mindfulness routine.

RELAX
Step away from stress and calm your mind with immersive, guided meditations.

FOCUS
Release tension and strengthen your mind-body connection with mood-boosting exercises.

PLAY
Let curiosity flow with uplifting games that build mindfulness skills you can take back to the real world.

Ready to bring mindfulness into your world? Download Headspace XR today and start to feel the benefits in just a few minutes.
